div.head: Waste book
div.ab: And first, François du Cros owes from 2nd September 1581, for 1 cane of cambric at 8 livres per canne, I make this -- 8 lb t.
Moved to the sales book at c. 25/
François du Cros owes from 2nd September 1581, for 1 canne of cambric at 8 livres per canne, as appears in the waste book at c. 25
Moved to the account book at c. 55 /

François du Cros owes from 2nd September 1581, for the merchandise taken by himself, as specified in detail in the sales book, No. 7 at c. 55, the sum of 8 livres, of which the said du Cros has made a bill on the said day, to be paid on St. Andrew’s day next, I make this -- 8 lb t.
